name: 3hr VR Challenge
description:
A quick in-class 3 hr game jam project.
The only requirement was that you are not the main character.

This is a VR game where the blimp circles around and progressively moves faster.
You grab the table in order to move the blue targets which the blimp must travel through.

Your challenge is to see how long you can last before hitting a wall and blowing up.

Using Unity XR Interaction toolkit | Built for Oculus Rift
